bill.title: Children's Health Insurance Program; transfer administration of to Division of Medicaid.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Sections 41-86-1, 41-86-5, 41-86-7, 41-86-9, 41-86-11, 41-86-13 And 41-86-15, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Transfer The Administration Of The Mississippi Children's Health Insurance Program From The State And School Employees Health Insurance Management Board To The Division Of Medicaid; To Repeal Sections 41-86-3, 41-86-17, 41-86-19 And 41-86-21, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Which Provide For A Temporary Program For Children's Health Insurance, Specify The Covered Benefits And Services To Be Provided Under The Children's Health Insurance Program, Establish A Children's Health Insurance Program Enrollment Outreach Initiative, And Establish A Children's Health Insurance Program Advisory Board And Joint Legislative Advisory Committee; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services;Medicaid
